Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Wakeforest Drive, west of the Dragon's Citadel.
Room.LongDescription: The Dragon's Citadel is filled with both mystery and danger. Although it has long been thought to have been abandoned, strange sounds are often heard from it at night. The entrance to the Citadel is located along Neilian Drive. On the west side of the road are a number of governmental building, the entrance to which are located on the other side of the building along Ministry Way.
